title: Social Problem-Solving Projects Utilizing a Chemistry Virtual Laboratory

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Simulating chemistry experiments in digital environments and proposing solutions to societal issues based on experimental results.

learning_goals: Reproduce chemical experiment procedures with 90% accuracy using a virtual laboratory.
Analyze experimental data to propose three or more solutions applicable to societal issues such as environmental pollution and new material development.
Integrate ICT tools and chemical knowledge to write laboratory reports in APA format within a digital environment.
Lead over 80% of the entire process—from experimental design to result interpretation—through collaborative teamwork.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
